contents.content: UNIT 02 面试话题 Interview Topics
Lesson 17 结束面试 Finishing the Interview
面试即将结束时，玛丽和面试官鲍勃先生之间的谈话。

contents.title: 鲍勃：这就是我们公司的总体情况，我想你已经很了解了吧。
contents.answer: Bob: That's all the general information of our company. I think you already have good knowledge about our company.

contents.title: 玛丽：是的，我已经有了总体的认识。
contents.answer: Yes, I have an overall understanding.

contents.title: 鲍勃：如果有结果了，我们会电话通知你的。
contents.answer: Bob: When we have the final results, we will call you.

contents.title: 玛丽：那么我最晚什么时候能得到答复？
contents.answer: Then when will I get a reply at the latest?

contents.content: 通常在求职者和面试官谈的差不多的时候，面试官会主动提醒求职者面试即将结束，让求职者耐心等待通知。这个时候，最好不要什么都不说就离开了，不妨问一下面试官有关面试结果或是其他问题，以表现出自己对这份工作很在意。

contents.title: 鲍勃：如果你通过面试，人事部会在两周之内通知你。
contents.answer: Bob: If you pass the interview, the personnel department will inform you within two weeks.

contents.title: 玛丽：但是如果我没有通过的话，还会电话通知吗？
contents.answer: But if I don't pass, will you call me?

contents.title: 鲍勃：抱歉，不会了。你可以等两周，如果你没接到电话，就表明你没通过。
contents.answer: Bob: I'm sorry we won't. You can wait for two weeks. If you don't get a telephone call, it means that you weren't successful.

contents.title: 玛丽：那么我有机会获得这份工作吗？
contents.answer: Then do I have the chance to get this job?

contents.title: 鲍勃：很抱歉，我自己不能做最后决定，我得跟其他面试官商量一下。
contents.answer: Bob: I'm sorry but I can't make the final decision myself, and I have to discuss it with other interviewers.

contents.content: 如果面试官已经明确地说明此次面试结束了，求职者就要准备离开了。不要匆匆告别，要礼貌地向面试官表示感谢，感谢他们给予面试的机会，以及为此付出的时间和精力。离开时要主动和面试官握手，致谢后再道别，以展现出自己的个人素质。

contents.title: 玛丽：我知道了。不管结果如何，从我们的谈话中我已经学到了很多东西。
contents.answer: I know. No matter what the result will be, I have learned a lot from our conversation.

contents.title: 鲍勃：你的心态很好，这样很不错。
contents.answer: Bob: Your mentality is very good and that's great.

contents.title: 玛丽：谢谢你给我这次面试的机会。
contents.answer: Thanks for giving me the opportunity of this interview.

contents.title: 鲍勃：不客气。
contents.answer: Bob: My pleasure.

contents.content: 如果非常关心面试结果，可以在面试结束时先向面试官询问一下，虽然不太可能当场就出结果，但是还是要试一试，说不定就会成功。

contents.title: 1.面试到此结束。
contents.answer: That's all for the interview.

contents.title: 2.按照惯例，我们以一个问题结束面试。
contents.answer: Let's end it with one question as customary.

contents.title: 3.我已经大致了解了贵公司的整体情况。
contents.answer: I already have a general idea about your company.

contents.title: 4.求职者通过面试后可以立即入职。
contents.answer: Candidates can start immediately after they have passed the interview.

contents.title: 5.很抱歉地告诉你，因为专业知识的欠缺你没能通过面试。
contents.answer: I'm sorry to tell you that you failed in the interview because of your shortage in professional knowledge.

contents.title: 6.有时甚至是最好的毕业生也不能通过面试。
contents.answer: Sometimes even the best graduates fail to pass the interview.

contents.title: 7.我很遗憾地告诉你你没有通过面试。
contents.answer: I regret to inform you that you didn't pass the interview.

contents.title: 8.我怀疑我能否通过面试。
contents.answer: I doubt whether I can pass the interview.

contents.title: 9.我很欣赏你的某些个人素质。
contents.answer: I appreciate certain personal qualities of yours.

contents.title: 10.你是个很优秀的人。
contents.answer: You are an excellent person.
